Articles.Content: can't click buildings. i have seen claw's tutorial but i don't understand it, also his mod doesn't help at all so here's my save [http://pastebin.com/e50PtSJ2](http://pastebin.com/e50PtSJ2)

Care to show what add-ons you're using? And beyond that, could you follow the steps outlined in [this guide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229)? 

With info like what asked above, providing help could be feasible, while now would be just a wild guess.
